description: A base layer is your system’s foundation. It needs to perform and it needs to be comfortable. Focused for lower output activities in cool temperatures, and made from their brushed Torrent™ stretch polyester, the Rho LT hoody delivers moisture transport, light warmth, and next-to-skin comfort. Its trim fit maximizes fabric performance and layers easily, a chest pocket is sized to secure a smartphone, and the hood provides options - neck warmer, traditional hood, or full coverage balaclava.
name: Arcteryx Rho LT Hoody - Mens
